text: @DonaldJTrumpJr Is your dad going to apologize for downplaying the #coronavirus when he just said that while he was downplaying it he knew it could get this bad in America. He should have for once in his life told the truth. But bc he didn't America is paying the ultimate price: PEOPLES LIVES
